DOC.brief_summary: Through this research we intend to evaluate whether a team-based care delivery approach using daily huddles is effective in improving caregiver and patient outcomes in primary care setting. This approach is expected to not only lead to effective primary care delivery outcomes, but also result in greater team morale, reduced burnout, and a higher rate of innovation.
DOC.brief_title: Team-Based Delivery of Care in Outpatient Settings
DOC.criteria: 18 year old adult member of Mayo care team in the Midwest Unable to provide consent
